revised_title: Magnetic and Meteorological Observatories: Report of the Joint Committee of the Royal Society and the British Association
tldr: The Joint Committee of the Royal Society and the British Association reports on the continuation of magnetic and meteorological observations in British Colonial Observatories. The study reveals precise measurements of magnetic elements, diurnal and annual fluctuations, and a new department of science related to magnetic action. The findings also establish a connection between the sun's physical constitution, solar spots, and the Aurora Borealis with the periodicity of magnetic fluctuations.
